channel.title: One connect per ip? HELP PLEASE
channel.description: hey guyys.. someone help me plz how to do make only one connect per ip.. help me how to do it on team viewer or something please ! I giv a rs acc vl 112 and owner on my server for it! =[

item.title: One connect per ip? HELP PLEASE
item.dc:creator: @ledgman ledgman
item.description:
@ledgman wrote:

Search for in client.java returnCode = 9; disconnected = true; savefile = false; return; }

Add this below the last bracket.

for(int i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.players.length; i++){
			  Player p = server.playerHandler.players[i]; if(p != null &&
			  !p.disconnected && p.connectedFrom.equals(connectedFrom) &&
			  playerId != p.playerId && !connectedFrom.equals("localhost") && !checkLog("connect", connectedFrom)){
			  sM("Address in use!"); returnCode = 9; disconnected =
			  true; return; } }

Read full topic
